name: vscode-bun-test-explorer
description: Run your Bun tests in the Sidebar of Visual Studio Code
author: Wildan Zulfikar <hey@wzulfikar.com>

scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.package: mkdir -p build && bunx vsce package -o build/vscode-bun-test-explorer.vsix

bunTestExplorer.logpanel.description: Write diagnotic logs to an output panel.
bunTestExplorer.logpanel.title: Log Panel

bunTestExplorer.logfile.description: Write diagnostic logs to the given file.
bunTestExplorer.logfile.title: Log File

bunTestExplorer.pathToBun.description: Override the path to the Bun executable. The default behavior is to attempt to detect common configurations.

bunTestExplorer.pathToBunConfig.description: Override the path to the Bun config file. The default behavior is to attempt to detect common configurations.
